## Llama

**LLaMA** (**Large Language Model Meta AI**) is a family of autoregressive [large language models](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Large_language_model "Large language model") (LLMs), released by [Meta AI](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Meta_AI "Meta AI") starting in February 2023.

Trainning models takes years,

## Understanding Ollama

## Running Code

When you click the **Render** button a document will be generated that includes both content and the output of embedded code. You can embed code like this:

```{r}

source("../libraries.R")

```

```{r}


library(rollama)

show_model() 

# %>% 
#   kable()



```

## Query

```{r}
rollama::query("")

```

The `echo: false` option disables the printing of code (only output is displayed).
